latex:
A line segment is divided so that the lesser part is to the greater part as the greater part is to the whole. If $ R$ is the ratio of the lesser part to the greater part, then the value of \[ R^{[R^{(R^2+R^{-1})}+R^{-1}]}+R^{-1}\] is\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2
\qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 2R
\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ R^{-1}
\qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 2+R^{-1}
\qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 2+R$
